lines.text: What'd you do with the cup, Lyle? Lucky doesn't know what you put in there but I do, you poisoned the old man, didn't you? You killed your uncle!

[to Lucky]
Even if I could read your mind, all you'd think about would be chasing cats and drinking out of the toilet.
We're going to the pet shop, where else is a dog going to go shopping?

[showing a pen to Lucky, but not Jack to see if he can read Lucky's thoughts]
What's this?
Looks like a stolen hotel pen, did you take the towels too?

[after spending a night being like Lucky tearing up everything]
So how bad did things get last night?
Well, let's just say that for the first time in my life, I locked my door and slept with the light on.

[after inheriting the estate]
I'm lord of the castle. I'm lord of the flies! Lord of the dance!
